forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. High 3C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 38F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds. Low near 0C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 31F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High 4C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 39F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 2C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low around 35F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 3C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 38F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High around 45F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 39F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High near 45F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. High 7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 46F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 3C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 37F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 7C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 44F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 4C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 39F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 9C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 47F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies with a few showers late. Low 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low around 40F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 49F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High around 10C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 50F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.
